name: Raju Sahu
title: Full-Stack (React, Node.js, SQL)
summary: Full-stack Software Engineer experienced in building scalable web apps using React.js, Node.js, and SQL Server. Focused on secure REST APIs, data visualization, file uploads, and PDF generation.

bullets: Built and maintained full-stack web apps using Node.js, React.js, and SQL Server.
Designed secure REST APIs and implemented SQL transactions for reliability.
Added file uploads, dynamic PDF generation, and dashboards with Chart.js.
Worked in Agile teams, ensuring delivery and best practices.
SQL-based reporting and automation with Python/Power BI.
Migrated legacy reports and used GitHub for version control.

projects.name: Team Productivity Platform
projects.desc: Manage tasks, skills, leave requests, and performance reviews.
highlights: 30+ REST APIs with auth and SQL transactions.
File uploads and dynamic PDF certificate generation.
